Included in this download are:
1) This readme File
3) A *PLUGIN* with the specific code requested.
4) A generic base controller (named generic)
5) the prototype js library

Install instructions:
1) Extract all files into your app folder directory. Such that you have
	/whereCakeIs/app/plugins/acl_admin
2) Browse to the url /whereCakeIs/AclAdmin.
3) If prompted by an error message, run the sql if shown or otherwise action the
	error.

Specific Plugin Notes
This plugin will only work with cake 1.1.
